block.coffins.coffin.disallowKey: Some scallywag already be ownin' this coffin!
gamerule.keepRecoveryCompass.description: Controls if ye keep yer recovery compass when ye meet Davy Jones
gamerule.showDeathCoordinates.descriptio: Controls whether t' show yer Death Coordinates when ye meet Davy Jones
gamerule.allowCoffinRobbing.description: Controls if other pirates be allowed t' loot coffins (Death Only)
gamerule.deathRequiresCoffin.description: Controls if a dead man's chest shall spawn only if the player has one on 'em (On Death)
